mapper.insert: insert into account_role_relationship (id, account_id, role_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, account_id, role_id, create_time, update_time from account_role_relationship
